Media Queries

  • To call the media query, use
    @include media(handhelds, large-screens)
  • Avoid "overwriting" styles with media queries. Always give "devices" their exact styles.

handhelds Query

  • handhelds: Below 680px
  • except-handhelds: Above 680px

small-screens Query

  • small-screens: Devices between 680px - 1000px
  • except-small-screens: Devices below 680px and above 1000px.
  • to-small-screens: Devices up to 1000px
  • above-small-screens: Devices above 1000px

medium-screens Query

  • medium-screens: Devices between 1000px and 1260px
  • except-medium-screens: Devices below 1000px and above 1260px
  • above-medium-screens: Devices above 1260px

large-screens Query

  • large-screens: Devices above 1260px
  • except-large-screens: Devices below 1260px
